posts.post_title: FS: Only Stark SGC40 remains. ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
Have these available for sale

$SOLD Keeler portrait

Comment sold or shoot me a PM.  “I‘ll take it” gets priority over negotiations.

Thanks for looking!
